description: This file defines a React component named DashboardLayout that manages the layout of a dashboard UI, including a mobile menu toggle, a sidebar component, and a content area.

methods.name: DashboardLayout
methods.description: React functional component that renders a dashboard layout with a toggleable mobile menu and sidebar.

methods.name: toggleMobileMenu
methods.description: Function that toggles the mobile menu open state.

methods.name: closeMobileMenu
methods.description: Function that closes the mobile menu.
